title: WealthTrees - Private Wealth Tracker
content:
WealthTree is a lightweight personal finance app for organizing your assets into a clear â€œtreeâ€ structureâ€”groups and assetsâ€”so you can see totals and allocations quickly. Track profit/loss, review breakdowns, and keep your data synced across devices when you want to.
DescriptionWealthTree helps you understand your wealth at a glance.
Build a clear structure for your finances using a simple â€œtreeâ€ model: create groups (like Cash, Investments, Real Estate) and add assets under each group. See totals, allocations, and performance in one place.
Key features:

Organize wealth with groups & assets
Totals and allocation breakdowns
Profit/loss tracking (amount and %)
Multi-currency support with exchange rates
Optional sync across devices
Export and sharing options

Designed to be lightweight and easy to useâ€”so you can update quickly and get clarity right away.
Download WealthTrees now and start your private wealth management journey! ğŸ’°

Visit App Store: WealthTrees - Private Wealth Tracker

title: Esay Period - Elegant Period Tracking App
content:
Esay Period is a period tracking and management app designed for women, built with native SwiftUI technology to provide a simple, private, and reliable cycle tracking experience.
ğŸŒŸ Key FeaturesğŸ“… Smart Cycle Management
Quick Recording: Easily log period start and end dates
Smart Prediction: Automatically predict next period based on historical data
Cycle Statistics: Auto-calculate average cycle, shortest/longest cycles
Calendar View: Intuitive calendar interface for viewing history at a glance

ğŸ”” Thoughtful Reminders
Local Notifications: Push reminders 1-7 days before period arrives
Email Reminders: Sync email notifications to your inbox
Custom Time: Freely set daily reminder time (HH:mm format)
Cute Alerts: ğŸŒºPeriod in X days / â˜˜ï¸Expected date

ğŸ—“ï¸ Calendar Features
Month Navigation: Easily browse any monthâ€™s cycle records
Dual Color Markers:
ğŸŒ¸ Pink: Period days
ğŸ”® Purple: Predicted dates


Today Highlight: Quickly locate current date
Cycle Visualization: Clearly display complete cycle information

ğŸ“Š Record Management
Detailed List: Display all cycle records in reverse chronological order
Note Function: Add personal notes to each record
Search Filter: Quickly search by year or note content
Swipe Actions: Swipe to delete unwanted records
Statistics Card: Real-time display of average cycle, total records, etc.

â˜ï¸ Data Sync & Backup
iCloud Auto Sync:
Uses private CloudKit database
End-to-end encryption, developer cannot access
Multi-device auto sync, data never lost


JSON Export/Import:
One-click export all data as JSON file
Support data recovery from JSON file
Three import modes: merge, replace, append


Third-Party Sync (Optional):
Support custom API endpoints
Configurable API Key for authentication
Flexible data upload/download mechanism



âš™ï¸ Personalization Settings
Reminder Days: Customize advance reminder days (1-7 days)
Reminder Time: Choose specific daily notification time
Period Length: Set typical period duration
Forecast Window: Configure forward prediction months
Email Reminders: Enable/configure email notification feature

ğŸŒ Multi-Language Support
ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Simplified Chinese
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ English
Dynamic language switching, no app restart needed

ğŸ”’ Privacy & Security
Local Storage: All data stored in your private iCloud
End-to-End Encryption: iCloud auto-encrypts transfer and storage
Zero Tracking: No collection of any personal privacy information
Ad-Free: Pure experience, no advertisements
Complete Deletion: Sign out to thoroughly clear local and cloud data


ğŸ¯ Use CasesDaily RecordingWhen your period arrives each month, simply open the app and tap â€œPeriod Startedâ€. When it ends, tap â€œPeriod Endedâ€ - itâ€™s that simple!
Cycle TrackingView your cycle statistics in the Records page:

Average cycle length
Shortest and longest cycles
Total record count

Future PredictionThe app intelligently predicts your next period based on your last 3 cycles and marks it in purple on the calendar.
Reminder SetupGo to â€œSettings â†’ Personalizationâ€:

Enable notification permission
Set reminder time (e.g., 10:00 daily)
Set advance reminder days (e.g., 1 day ahead)
Optional: Configure email reminders

Data BackupWorried about data loss?

Auto Sync: Data automatically backs up to cloud when logged into iCloud
Manual Export: Go to â€œSettings â†’ Sync & Backup â†’ Export JSONâ€ to save local copy
Cross-Device Migration: Import JSON file on new device to restore all data


ğŸ’¡ Core Advantages


Feature
Esay Period
Other Apps



Native SwiftUI
âœ… Smooth & Fluid
âŒ Laggy cross-platform frameworks


iCloud Encryption
âœ… End-to-end encrypted
âš ï¸ Server storage, privacy risk


Completely Free
âœ… No IAP, no subscription
âŒ Premium features require payment


Ad-Free
âœ… Pure experience
âŒ Full of ads


Data Export
âœ… JSON format
âŒ Data locked in


Multi-Language
âœ… Chinese & English
âš ï¸ English only


Email Reminders
âœ… Supported
âŒ Not supported



ğŸ› ï¸ Technical Highlights
SwiftUI + SwiftData: Latest Apple native tech stack
CloudKit Integration: Private database + public configuration
Local Notifications: UNUserNotificationCenter scheduled reminders
Email Service: Custom email API integration
Elegant UI: Gradients, rounded cards, smooth animations


ğŸ“– Quick Start GuideStep 1: Record First Period
Open the app, switch to â€œCalendarâ€ tab
Tap â€œğŸŒ¸ Period Startedâ€ button
App automatically records current date

Step 2: End Recording
When period ends, tap â€œğŸŒ¸ Period Endedâ€ again
App automatically calculates cycle length

Step 3: Set Reminders
Go to â€œSettingsâ€ tab
Enable â€œNotificationsâ€ toggle
Tap â€œReminder Timeâ€ to set daily notification time
Tap â€œRemind Days Aheadâ€ to set reminder range (1-7 days)

Step 4: Enable Email Reminders (Optional)
Find â€œEmail Remindersâ€ in â€œPersonalizationâ€
Enable toggle and enter email address
Supports multiple emails, separate with comma or semicolon
Tap â€œSend Test Emailâ€ to verify configuration

Step 5: View Statistics
Switch to â€œRecordsâ€ tab
Top card displays your cycle statistics
List below shows all historical records
Purple card shows next predicted date


ğŸ¨ Interface PreviewCalendar View
Clean monthly calendar layout
Pink marks for period days
Purple marks for predicted dates
Todayâ€™s date highlighted
Current cycle info at top

Records View
Statistics card: average cycle, shortest, longest
Prediction card: next period countdown
Record list: time, notes, cycle length
Search function: quickly find specific records

Settings View
Notification toggle
Sync & Backup
Personalization (reminder time, days, etc.)
Account & Data Management
Privacy Policy & About


ğŸ” Privacy Policy
Data Storage: All period records, notes, and prediction data are stored in your private iCloud database with end-to-end encryption. The developer cannot access or view your data and keeps no server copy.

Data Usage: Data is only used locally for statistics, predictions, and reminders. No selling, sharing, or advertising/tracking.

Permissions: Only notification permission is requested for cycle reminders. No location, contacts, or unrelated permissions.

Data Deletion & Export: You can export JSON data in Settings anytime or completely remove all local/iCloud data via â€œSign Outâ€.

Security: iCloud handles encrypted transfer and storage; the app collects no tracking identifiers.

Contact: For questions, please use the App Store developer email.



â“ FAQQ: Will my data be lost?A: No. As long as youâ€™re logged into iCloud and have iCloud sync enabled, data automatically backs up to the cloud. Even if you delete the app or switch devices, data will auto-restore after reinstalling.
Q: Can I use it on multiple devices?A: Yes. iCloud automatically syncs data across all devices logged into the same account in real-time.
Q: Why am I not receiving notifications?A: Please check:

Whether notifications are enabled in â€œSettings â†’ Notificationsâ€
Whether notification permission is granted in iOS Settings â†’ Esay Period â†’ Notifications
Whether correct reminder time and days are set
Ensure app has calculated predicted date (requires at least 2 historical records)

Q: Why didnâ€™t I receive email reminders?A: Please check:

Whether â€œEmail Remindersâ€ is enabled in â€œPersonalizationâ€
Whether email address is entered correctly
Check spam/junk folder
Tap â€œSend Test Emailâ€ to verify configuration

Q: How do I delete an incorrect record?A: In â€œRecordsâ€ page, swipe left on the corresponding record and tap the red delete button.
Q: How do I export all data?A: Go to â€œSettings â†’ Sync & Backup â†’ Export JSONâ€ and choose where to save.
Q: How do I change language?A: Go to â€œSettings â†’ Account & Data â†’ Languageâ€, select â€œä¸­æ–‡â€ or â€œEnglishâ€, and the app switches immediately.
Q: Is the app completely free?A: Yes! Esay Period is completely free with no in-app purchases, subscriptions, or ads.
Q: How do I completely delete data?A: Go to â€œSettings â†’ Account & Data â†’ Sign Outâ€, confirm twice, and it will delete all local and iCloud data. This action is irreversible, please proceed with caution.

ğŸ“® Feedback & SupportContact UsIf you encounter any problems or have feature suggestions, please contact us:

In-App Feedback: Settings â†’ Feedback
App Store Reviews: Welcome to share your experience
Developer Email: Available on App Store page

Rating SupportIf you like Esay Period, please give us a five-star review on the App Store â­â­â­â­â­. Your support is our motivation for continuous improvement!

ğŸš€ Future PlansWeâ€™re planning the following features:

 Temperature recording & curve charts
 Symptom tracking (pain, mood, etc.)
 More statistical charts
 Widget support
 Apple Watch support
 Health data integration
 Dark mode optimization
 iPad adaptation


ğŸ“„ License & CopyrightÂ© 2024 Esay Period. All rights reserved.
This app follows strict privacy protection policies. All data belongs to users.

Download Esay Period now and start your smart cycle management journey! ğŸŒ¸

Visit App Store: Esay Period - Elegant Period Tracking App

title: ğŸ¤ About Me
content:
ğŸ‘‹ Hello, Iâ€™m HarryIâ€™m an independent developer passionate about creating meaningful applications that respect user freedom and privacy.

ğŸ’¡ My PhilosophyI believe in the power of small but beautiful apps â€” tools that do one thing exceptionally well without unnecessary complexity. 
Your data belongs to you. Iâ€™m committed to building applications where your personal information stays in your hands, not uploaded to corporate servers for advertising or profit. In an era of data exploitation, I believe itâ€™s time for software to return to its essence: serving users, not surveilling them.

Privacy is not about having something to hide. Itâ€™s about having something to protect: your autonomy, your dignity, and your right to be yourself.


ğŸ¯ What I DoI create tools that:

âœ¨ Prioritize user experience over feature bloat
ğŸ”’ Keep your data local and secure
ğŸŒ± Respect your time and attention
ğŸš€ Focus on simplicity and elegance

Every line of code I write is guided by one principle: technology should empower individuals, not exploit them.

ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ Beyond the ScreenWhen Iâ€™m not coding, youâ€™ll find me:

ğŸ›¹ Skateboarding through city streets
ğŸš´ Cycling on scenic routes
ğŸš¶ Power walking to clear my mind

These activities remind me that the best solutions often come when we step away from the keyboard and reconnect with the physical world.

ğŸŒ My Values
User sovereignty: You should control your technology, not the other way around
Digital minimalism: Less is more when it comes to features
Open communication: Transparency builds trust
Continuous learning: Every project is an opportunity to grow
Sustainability: Building for the long term, not quick profits


ğŸ“¬ Get in TouchIâ€™m always excited to connect with fellow developers, designers, and users who share these values.

ğŸ“§ Email: haoleiq@gmail.com
ğŸŒ Website: harry-studio.github.io/app

Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to chat about technology and user freedom, feel free to reach out!

â€œThe best technology is the technology you donâ€™t notice â€” it simply works, respects you, and gets out of your way.â€
